entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain and ice pellets changing to rain this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
